00001 #include "CFireBall.h"
00002 #include "../../../sdl/sound/CSound.h"
00003 
00004 // fireball projectile shot out by Vorticon Mother (Ep3)
00005 
00006 #define FIREBALL_SPEED     46
00007 #define FIREBALL_HARD_SPEED  80
00008 #define FIREBALL_ANIM_RATE     20
00009 
00010 #define FIREBALL_LEFT_FRAME    57
00011 #define FIREBALL_RIGHT_FRAME   59
00012 
00013 #define FIREBALL_OFFSCREEN_KILL_TIME     25
00014 
00015 CFireBall::CFireBall(CMap *p_map, Uint32 x, Uint32 y,
00016   direction_t dir, object_t byType, size_t byID) :
00017 CRay(p_map, x, y, dir, byType, byID)
00018 {
00019  animframe = 0;
00020  animtimer = 0;
00021  inhibitfall = true;
00022  blockedl = blockedr = 0;
00023  canbezapped = 1;
00024  if(dir == LEFT)
00025   this->x-=(14<<STC);
00026  m_speed = (mp_Map->m_Difficulty>1) ? FIREBALL_HARD_SPEED : FIREBALL_SPEED;
00027  sprite = (m_Direction == RIGHT) ? FIREBALL_RIGHT_FRAME : FIREBALL_LEFT_FRAME;
00028  performCollisions();
00029 }
00030 
00031 void CFireBall::process()
00032 {
00033  // check if it was shot
00034  if (HealthPoints <= 0 && state == RAY_STATE_FLY)
00035  {
00036   if (onscreen) g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_SHOT_HIT, PLAY_NOW, scrx);
00037   m_type = OBJ_RAY;
00038   state = RAY_STATE_SETZAPZOT;
00039   inhibitfall = 1;
00040   return;
00041  }
00042 
00043  if(state == RAY_STATE_FLY)
00044  {
00045   if (m_Direction == RIGHT)
00046    sprite = FIREBALL_RIGHT_FRAME + animframe;
00047   else
00048    sprite = FIREBALL_LEFT_FRAME + animframe;
00049 
00050   moveinAir();
00051 
00052   // animation
00053   if (animtimer > FIREBALL_ANIM_RATE)
00054   {
00055    animframe ^= 1;
00056    animtimer = 0;
00057   }
00058   else animtimer++;
00059  }
00060  else if(state == RAY_STATE_SETZAPZOT)
00061   setZapped();
00062  else
00063   gotZapped();
00064 }
